class.name: CompositeClause
class.brief_description: A clause that combines multiple clauses.
class.description: The CompositeClause class allows combining multiple DojoClauses using logical operators (AND, OR) to create complex query filters.

method.name: add
method.description: Adds a clause to the composite clause.

method.name: set_operator
method.description: Sets the logical operator for combining the clauses.

method.name: to_dict
method.description: Converts the clause to a dictionary representation.
